mapper.insert: insert into club( CLUB_NAME, CLUB_CREATOR, LEADER_ID, CLUB_INTRODUCE, CLUB_DESC, CLUB_IMG, IS_DELETE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) values ( #{clubName}, #{clubCreator}, #{leaderId}, #{clubIntroduce}, #{clubDesc}, #{clubImg}, #{isDelete}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: update club set CLUB_NAME = #{clubName}, CLUB_CREATOR = #{clubCreator}, LEADER_ID = #{leaderId}, CLUB_INTRODUCE = #{clubIntroduce}, CLUB_DESC = #{clubDesc}, CLUB_IMG = #{clubImg}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select c.id,c.CLUB_NAME,c.CLUB_CREATOR,c.LEADER_ID,c.CLUB_INTRODUCE,c.CLUB_IMG,c.IS_DELETE,c.CREATE_TIME,c.UPDATE_TIME, c.CLUB_DESC, u.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT from club c left join (select count(1) as AMOUNT,CLUB_ID from user where status =0 GROUP BY CLUB_ID) u on u.CLUB_ID = c.id GROUP BY c.id
